scripts.watch: npm run sass:watch:ng & npm run sass:watch:landing & webpack --watch
scripts.watch:dev: npm run server & npm run watch
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:target && npm run clean:ngc && npm run clean:css
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run sass && npm run sass:landing
scripts.prod:setup: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run sass
scripts.build:prod:ngc: npm run prod:setup && npm run ngc && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:prod:ngc:json: npm run prebuild && npm run ngc && npm run build:prod:json
scripts.landing: npm run clean && npm run sass:landing && npm run landing:copy
scripts.landing:copy: mkdir -p appengine/target && cp landing/landing.css appengine/target/ && cp landing/landing.js appengine/target/ && cp landing/confirmation.js appengine/target/ && cp landing/index.html appengine/target/cypherpunk-public.html && cp landing/confirmation.html appengine/target/ && cp landing/thanks.html appengine/target/ && cp landing/privacy.html appengine/target/ && cp landing/invites-sent.html appengine/target/ && mkdir -p appengine/target/assets && cp assets/assets/logo* appengine/target/assets/ && mkdir -p appengine/target/assets/landing && cp assets/assets/landing/* appengine/target/assets/landing/ && mkdir -p appengine/target/assets/fonts && cp assets/assets/fonts/* appengine/target/assets/fonts/ && cp assets/robots.txt appengine/target/
scripts.landing:addon: mkdir -p appengine/target && npm run sass:landing && cp landing/index.html appengine/target/ && cp landing/confirmation.html appengine/target/ && cp landing/thanks.html appengine/target/ && cp landing/privacy.html appengine/target/ && cp landing/invites-sent.html appengine/target/ && cp landing/landing.css appengine/target/ && cp landing/landing.js appengine/target/ && cp landing/confirmation.js appengine/target/
scripts.debug:start: npm run build && npm run debug:server
